name: Speeramyd Plunder
description:
Pixel artish platformer game set in an ancient pyramid with a goal of nabbing the most precious treasure of them all! It won't come so easy though, as there are many traps and pitfalls for you to get through.

Can you beat the game in under 2 minutes? The best time I've got was 1:16. Be sure to post your personal best time in the comments!

Instructions:

  • Movement WASD or arrow keys
  • R to reset the run
  • M to toggle sounds

This game is an entry for Godot Wild Jam 42, on the theme Ancient. Optional wild card Gotta go fast was included too, in a form of a speedrun timer.

Credits:

It was all me in about 20 hours! ...except the fancy music and sound effects from:

  • https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
  • https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/484267/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Breviceps/sounds/458398/
